episodes.title: Dekalog, jeden
episodes.description: A woman worries about her nephew's spiritual education, whose life and his father's are run on their home computer.

episodes.title: Dekalog, dwa
episodes.description: A woman with a gravely ill husband and pregnant of her lover faces a dilemma: if her husband dies, she'll keep the baby; if not, she'll abort.

episodes.title: Dekalog, trzy
episodes.description: On Christmas Eve, a taxi driver's ex-lover asks him for help to look for her missing husband.

episodes.title: Dekalog, cztery
episodes.description: When her father is away on business, a young woman discovers a letter from her dead mother reading, 'Open after my death'.

episodes.title: Dekalog, piec
episodes.description: A soon-to-be lawyer crosses his path with a taxi driver and a young sinister man.

episodes.title: Dekalog, szesc
episodes.description: A teenager spies on his older neighbour through binoculars.

episodes.title: Dekalog, siedem
episodes.description: Raised as sisters, one is in fact the other's mother. Unwilling to continue living a lie, the mother tries to get her daughter back from her parents.

episodes.title: Dekalog, osiem
episodes.description: A researcher meets a professor and reveals herself as the child to whom she refused to shelter during World War II.

episodes.title: Dekalog, dziewiec
episodes.description: Following the discovery of his sexual impotence a man urges his wife to take a lover.

episodes.title: S1.E10 âˆ™ Dekalog, dziesiec
episodes.description: After their father's death, two brothers inherit a valuable stamp collection.
